TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDispatchMessageInspector

summary.span: 定义一些方法，通过这些方法，可以在服务应用程序中对入站和出站应用程序消息进行自定义检查或修改。

span.span: Defines the methods that enable custom inspection or modification of inbound and outbound application messages in service applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 可以在将请求消息调度到操作或者将回复消息返回到调用方之前，检查或修改入站或出站应用程序消息。Implement to inspect or modify inbound or outbound application messages either prior to dispatching a request message to an operation or before returning a reply message to a caller. 在许多情况下，调用将消息发送到的操作之前，需要先截获消息。There are a large number of scenarios that require intercepting messages prior to invoking the operation for which it is destined. 例如，您可以记录传入的应用程序消息或根据消息头执行某种功能。For example, you can log incoming application messages or perform some feature based on a message header. 通常情况下，由一个服务行为 ()、一个终结点行为 () 或一个协定行为 () 来插入消息检查器。Typically, message inspectors are inserted by a service behavior (), an endpoint behavior (), or a contract behavior (). 然后，该行为将消息检查器添加到 集合。The behavior then adds the message inspector to the collection. 有关扩展运行时使用的行为的详细信息，请参阅[扩展 ServiceHost 和服务模型层](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md)。For more information about extending the runtime using behaviors, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md). - 在接收消息之后、将消息调度到目标操作之前， 方法启用自定义行为。The method enables custom behavior after receiving the message but before dispatching it to the intended operation. - 在操作返回之后发送回复之前， 方法启用自定义行为。The method enables custom behavior after the operation returns but before the reply is sent. > [!NOTE] > 在消息调度过程中，无论操作是单向还是请求-回复，始终在相同的点调用 对象。 objects are always called at the same point during message dispatch regardless of whether an operation is one-way or request-reply. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个基本的 ，当调用它时会将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows a basic that writes a string to the console when it is invoked. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#7)] 下面的代码示例演示 的实现，它将 `Inspector` 添加到 集合。The following code example shows the implementation of an that adds the `Inspector` to the collection. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#8)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用应用程序配置文件来加载插入 `Inspector` 的服务行为。The following code example shows the use of an application configuration file to load the service behavior that inserts the `Inspector`. [!code-xml[Interceptors#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object AfterReceiveRequest (ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel, System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext instanceContext);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AfterReceiveRequest(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message& request, class System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel, class System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext instanceContext) cil managed

public: System::Object ^ AfterReceiveRequest(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ % request, System::ServiceModel::IClientChannel ^ channel, System::ServiceModel::InstanceContext ^ instanceContext);
abstract member AfterReceiveRequest : * System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel * System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext -> obj

summary.span: 在已接收入站消息后将消息调度到应发送到的操作之前调用。

span.span: Called after an inbound message has been received but before the message is dispatched to the intended operation.
The object used to correlate state.

returns.span: 该对象将在 方法中传回。

span.span: This object is passed back in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以检查或修改传入消息、提供该消息的客户端通道，以及当前服务实例。Use the method to inspect or modify the incoming message, the client channel that provided it, and the current service instance. 返回值可以是要用于关联目的的任何对象；在 `correlationState` 方法中，它作为 参数返回。The return value can be any object that you want to use for correlation purposes; it is returned to you as the `correlationState` parameter in the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不能使用消息的正文，除非缓冲整个消息并制作副本。You cannot use the body of the message unless you buffer the entire message and make a copy. 如果这样做，则必须制作两个消息副本，一个用于检查，另一个覆盖 `request` 参数。If you do this, you must make two copies of the message: one to inspect, and the other to overwrite the `request` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个基本的 ，当调用它时会将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows a basic that writes a string to the console when it is invoked. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#7)] 下面的代码示例演示 的实现，它将 `Inspector` 添加到 集合。The following code example shows the implementation of an that adds the `Inspector` to the collection. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#8)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用应用程序配置文件来加载插入 `Inspector` 的服务行为。The following code example shows the use of an application configuration file to load the service behavior that inserts the `Inspector`. [!code-xml[Interceptors#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void BeforeSendReply (ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message reply, object correlationState);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeforeSendReply(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message& reply, object correlationState) cil managed
Public Sub BeforeSendReply (ByRef reply As Message, correlationState As Object)

param.name: reply
param.span: 如果操作是单向的，则此值为 null。

span.span: This value is null if the operation is one way.

param.name: correlationState
param.span: 从 方法返回的关联对象。

span.span: The correlation object returned from the method.

summary.span: 在操作已返回后发送回复消息之前调用。

span.span: Called after the operation has returned but before the reply message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在发送返回消息之前，使用 方法来执行自定义行为。Use the method to perform custom behavior prior to sending the return message. `correlationState` 是从 方法返回的对象，您可以使用它在入站和出站调用间执行关联来支持您的行为。The `correlationState` is the object returned from the method that you can use to perform correlation between inbound and outbound calls to support your behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个基本的 ，当调用它时会将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows a basic that writes a string to the console when it is invoked. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#7)] 下面的代码示例演示 的实现，它将 `Inspector` 添加到 集合。The following code example shows the implementation of an that adds the `Inspector` to the collection. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#8)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用应用程序配置文件来加载插入 `Inspector` 的服务行为。The following code example shows the use of an application configuration file to load the service behavior that inserts the `Inspector`. [!code-xml[Interceptors#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#9)]
